text:
In our new Ep @honigsbaum explores the first #vaccine against #Smallpox by doctor #EdwardJenner. With @owentg from @DrJennersHouse. #Jenner’s statue stands at the entrance of @JennerInstitute @UniofOxford - from smallpox to #Covid19 💉

🎧 Listen here ➡️ https://t.co/puE4YbDQHY https://t.co/TBG0CPQRmQ
